item.title: VOLKS Announces Online After-Event Sales For Dollfie Dream Sakura Miku & Hatsune Miku Reboot
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
VOLKS, the creator of the Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku dolls, has announced there will be online after-event sales after Dolls Party 41 event on April 28th! The online sales are announced to begin May 11th, 2019 JST. The Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku information page has been updated to show new information on the dolls, and …

The post VOLKS Announces Online After-Event Sales For Dollfie Dream Sakura Miku & Hatsune Miku Reboot appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
VOLKS, the creator of the Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku dolls, has announced there will be online after-event sales after Dolls Party 41 event on April 28th! The online sales are announced to begin May 11th, 2019 JST. The Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku information page has been updated to show new information on the dolls, and the event dates.

Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku details page: https://www.volks.co.jp/miku/

Both DD Sakura Miku and Hatsune Miku Reboot will use VOLKS’ newer “F3” type body frame, which allows even better flexibility and posing possibilities versus previous versions.

The precise time the sale starts is not yet announced, so be sure to watch closely for that announcement at a later date! Dollfie Dream Sakura Miku will be priced at 72,144 Yen, while Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku Reboot will be priced at 71,064 Yen. Each one has their own details page as well.

Dollfie Dream Sakura miku detail: https://www.volks.co.jp/miku/dd_miku_reboot/
Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku Reboot detail: https://www.volks.co.jp/miku/dd_miku_reboot/
VOLKS DD Twitter: https://twitter.com/volks_dd

Source: Mikufan.com

The post VOLKS Announces Online After-Event Sales For Dollfie Dream Sakura Miku & Hatsune Miku Reboot appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Snow Miku 2018 and Vampire Outfits For Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku Preorders To Open From February 17th
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
Two new outfits for Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku will be open for preorder starting tomorrow: the SNOW MIKU 2018 Crane Priestess outfit set celebrating Snow Miku 2018, and the Vampire outfit set based on the visual by PEACH-PIT, the author of “Rozen Maiden”. Both outfits will be available for preorder starting tomorrow at 11:00 JST with …

The post Snow Miku 2018 and Vampire Outfits For Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku Preorders To Open From February 17th appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Two new outfits for Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku will be open for preorder starting tomorrow: the SNOW MIKU 2018 Crane Priestess outfit set celebrating Snow Miku 2018, and the Vampire outfit set based on the visual by PEACH-PIT, the author of “Rozen Maiden”. Both outfits will be available for preorder starting tomorrow at 11:00 JST with shipping to begin in summer 2018.

With the addition of the two, Dollfie Dream Miku’s closet now amounts to ten outfits in total!

Follow the links below for gallery and more info!

SNOW MIKU 2018 Crane Priestess Outfit Set

Price: 21,384 yen (with fee)
Preorder period: February 17th 11:00~March 4th 24:00, 2018 (JST)
Estimated delivery schedule: Summer 2018

Special website: http://www.volks.co.jp/miku/dress0901/
Preorder website: https://www.volks.co.jp/sp_d_004_miku_snow2018_en/?version=en

Vampire Outfit Set

Price: 15,984 yen (with fee)
Preorder period: February 17th 11:00~March 4th 24:00, 2018 (JST)
Estimated delivery schedule: Summer 2018

Special website: http://www.volks.co.jp/miku/dress10/
Preorder website: https://www.volks.co.jp/sp_d_004_miku_vampire_en/?version=en

Source: Mikufan.com

The post Snow Miku 2018 and Vampire Outfits For Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku Preorders To Open From February 17th appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOLKS USA at Anime Expo with Dollfie Honey Miku!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
VOLKS USA will be out of the office this weekend but for a very good reason! They’re attending Anime Expo in California! While we can’t guarantee the merchandise that they’ll have at the con, online sales of a TON of VOCALOID Dollfie Dream items and the dolls themselves will start July 1st. They’ll last until …

The post VOLKS USA at Anime Expo with Dollfie Honey Miku! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
VOLKS USA will be out of the office this weekend but for a very good reason! They’re attending Anime Expo in California! While we can’t guarantee the merchandise that they’ll have at the con, online sales of a TON of VOCALOID Dollfie Dream items and the dolls themselves will start July 1st. They’ll last until July 10th or when the online store runs out. You can find more information on all the items for sale here. But the highlight of VOLKS USA at Anime Expo is definitely going to be the Dollfie Honey Miku performing! You can find VOLKS USA at Booth #600.

Dollfie® Honey x “Hatsune Miku”

VOLKS, Inc. collaborated with Speecys Corp., the developers of the “AIBO” (Artificial Intelligence Robot), to create a new innovative and entertaining way to enjoy Dollfie®. This technology, called the “Dollfie® Honey”, is a self-moving doll with a body height of 60 cm. In addition, it has the freedom of about 28 degrees of movement. Its appearance is easily customized due to its soft outer skin and compatibility with Dollfie Dream® heads and costumes.

The Dollfie® Honey is equipped with a RaspberryPi 3 CPU board powered by Linux. The “Dollfie® Honey” will utilizes the VOLKS’ Dollfie Dream® exterior and will be able to connect via WiFi and other options. Best of all, the doll’s movements are programmable via MikuMikuDance!

While first shown at Magical Mirai 2016, this will be her western debut!

Posted by Dollfie Dream on Monday, June 19, 2017

Booth Events

While most events at the booth aren’t VOCALOID related, fans who are heading to AX can bring their VOCALOID Dollfies for a photo shoot!

Posted by VOLKS USA, Inc. on Wednesday, May 31, 2017

At the moment, the time and date are unknown. So be sure to follow the VOLKS USA at Anime Expo 2017 event page for information. Or you can stop by the booth (Booth #600)!

——–

Sources: Anime News Network, Official Event Page

The post VOLKS USA at Anime Expo with Dollfie Honey Miku! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOLKS USA Online Sales Opening for VOCALOID Dollfies and Dollfie Accessories!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Have you been dying to get a VOCALOID Dollfie Dream? Or maybe you just really need those hand parts for Miku to hold her leek. No matter the case, VOLKS USA has you covered! The Miku, Rin, and Len Dollfies will be available for sale starting July 1st. In addition, there are hand parts galore …

The post VOLKS USA Online Sales Opening for VOCALOID Dollfies and Dollfie Accessories! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Have you been dying to get a VOCALOID Dollfie Dream? Or maybe you just really need those hand parts for Miku to hold her leek. No matter the case, VOLKS USA has you covered! The Miku, Rin, and Len Dollfies will be available for sale starting July 1st. In addition, there are hand parts galore and other accessories as well! All items will be available on the VOLKS USA online store until July 10th unless they sell out before then.

Dolls For Sale

Links lead to the product pages. Bookmark them if you plan to purchase!

Dollfie Dream® Hatsune Miku ($682)
Dollfie Dream® Snow Miku ($650)
Dollfie Dream® Sister “Kagamine Rin” ($648)
Dollfie Dream® Sister “Kagamine Len” ($694)

Song Themed Outfits!

PLEASE NOTE: The outfits do NOT come with the dolls! Dolls must be purchased separately.

Senbonzakura Outfit Set (Ichi no Sakura: Cherry Blossom) ($198)
Senbonzakura Outfit Set (Ni no Sakura: Butterfly) ($180)
Senbonzakura Outfit Set (Ni no Sakura: Fan Dance) ($180)
“Mikuzukin” Set ($185)
“Ribbon Girl” Outfit Set ($240)
SIREN Outfit Set ($130)

Accessories

Cooking Set ($39)
Megaphone/Speaker ($28)

Hand Parts!

There are 13 different optional hand parts available for $33 per set. All of these hands have their fingernails painted especially to match Miku! You can find the hand parts at bottom of page 2 in the product lineup and all of page 3.

More Information

For a full listing of all items on sale during this ten day web sales event, check out the full lineup online. Sales start at 10AM PT  on July 1st so be ready!

——

Special thanks to Vocaloid Buy Blog for bringing this to everyone’s attention!

The post VOLKS USA Online Sales Opening for VOCALOID Dollfies and Dollfie Accessories! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Rin & Len DDS Now Available Online & “Daughter of Evil/Servant of Evil” DDS Outfit Sets Pages Up!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
While these much anticipated Rin & Len Dollfie Dream Sister outfit sets were announced in February with the event sales announced in April, these DDS outfit sets finally have an international purchase page. While they aren’t up for purchase at the moment, you can expect them to be available in the near future! DDS Rin & …

The post Rin & Len DDS Now Available Online & “Daughter of Evil/Servant of Evil” DDS Outfit Sets Pages Up! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
While these much anticipated Rin & Len Dollfie Dream Sister outfit sets were announced in February with the event sales announced in April, these DDS outfit sets finally have an international purchase page. While they aren’t up for purchase at the moment, you can expect them to be available in the near future!

DDS Rin & Len Available Internationally

While these two were available from VOLKS USA in April, they’re now available for international purchase as well! Those who missed out or lost the lottery have a chance at grabbing these two. Please note that they’re limited to one each per customer.

You can buy Rin here for ¥70,000 JPY with fee (about $616 USD) and Len here for ¥75,000 JPY with fee (about $660 USD).

“Daughter of Evil” Rin Outfit

Price: ¥20,304 JPY with fee (about $179 USD)

Includes: Wig, Hair Ribbon, Hairpin (large), Hairpin (small), Collar, Ribbon Brooch, One Piece, Waist Belt, Sleeve, Under Skirt, Pannier, and Shoes

THIS DOES NOT INCLUDE THE DOLL.

You can buy Rin separately here for ¥70,000 JPY with fee (about $616 USD).

You can buy the outfit here once it’s available.

“Servant of Evil” Len Outfit

Price: ¥18,144 JPY with fee (about $160 USD)

Includes: Wig, Hair Ribbon, Jacket, Vest, Jabot, Blouse, Pants, Tights, and Shoes

THIS DOES NOT INCLUDE THE DOLL.

You can purchase Len separately here for ¥75,000 JPY with fee (about $660 USD).

You can but the outfit here once it’s available.

They Can Swap Outfits!

Just like the song “Servant of Evil” says, DDS Kagamine Rin & Len can swap their clothing with each other!

If you’ve ever wanted these dolls and outfits, now’s the time to grab them!

The post Rin & Len DDS Now Available Online & “Daughter of Evil/Servant of Evil” DDS Outfit Sets Pages Up! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “Servant of Evil” & “Daughter of Evil” Dollfie Dream Sister Outfits Details Revealed!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Back in February, VOLKS revealed two new outfits for the Kagamine Dollfies. The “Servant of Evil” and “Daughter of Evil” Dollfie Dream Sister outfits excited Kagamine fans everywhere. And now we finally have details on how to grab these outfits for your dolls! “Servant of Evil” Len Outfit Price: ¥16,800 JPY (about $168 USD) plus tax …

The post “Servant of Evil” & “Daughter of Evil” Dollfie Dream Sister Outfits Details Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Back in February, VOLKS revealed two new outfits for the Kagamine Dollfies. The “Servant of Evil” and “Daughter of Evil” Dollfie Dream Sister outfits excited Kagamine fans everywhere. And now we finally have details on how to grab these outfits for your dolls!

“Servant of Evil” Len Outfit

Price: ¥16,800 JPY (about $168 USD) plus tax
Includes: Wig, Hair Ribbon, Jacket, Vest, Jabot, Blouse, Pants, Tights, and Shoes

“Daughter of Evil” Rin Outfit

Price: ¥18,800 JPY (about $188 USD) plus tax
Includes: Wig, Hair Ribbon, Hairpin (large), Hairpin (small), Collar, Ribbon Brooch, One Piece, Waist Belt, Sleeve, Under Skirt, Pannier, and Shoes

How to Get Them

At the moment, these outfits are only available through a few pre-sale events.

Joint Festival 5

Date: May 6th, 2017
Location: TOKYO BIG SIGHT East 1 ・2 Hall
Official Website

Joint Festival After Event

Date: May 27th, 2017
Further details currently unknown.

Other Methods

While the outfits are currently limited in availability, be sure to watch VNN for news on international sales. In addition, CDJapan now offers a proxy service. So be sure to watch them as well to see if they make these outfits available!

Sources: Ameblo Blog (Kagamine Len “Servant of Evil”), Ameblo Blog (Kagamine Rin “Daughter of Evil”)

The post “Servant of Evil” & “Daughter of Evil” Dollfie Dream Sister Outfits Details Revealed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VOLKS USA Hosting Limited Web Event for VOCALOID Dollfie Dream Dolls!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
In celebration of ANIME MATSURI 2017, VOLKS USA is hosting a limited web event. Fans who missed out on the initial orders for Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku, Dollfie Dream Sister Kagamine Rin, and Dollfie Dream Sister Kagamine Len, now have a chance to grab them! In addition to the dolls being for sale, there are …

The post VOLKS USA Hosting Limited Web Event for VOCALOID Dollfie Dream Dolls! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In celebration of ANIME MATSURI 2017, VOLKS USA is hosting a limited web event. Fans who missed out on the initial orders for Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku, Dollfie Dream Sister Kagamine Rin, and Dollfie Dream Sister Kagamine Len, now have a chance to grab them! In addition to the dolls being for sale, there are quite a few costumes as well! All sales will begin on April 7th, 2017, and last until April 17th, 2017. However, these VOCALOID Dollfie Dream Dolls are limited. Grab them before they’re gone!

In addition, the dolls will be available at ANIME MATSURI 2017 in Houston, Texas. So if you’re at the convention, you can grab them there as well!

The Dolls

Of course, the highlight for fans is the Dollfies themselves. The much sought after dolls go for quite a high price in the secondhand market and this is the perfect opportunity to grab them at market value!

Dollfie Dream Hatsune Miku

Price: $682.00 USD

Purchase Page: http://volksusastore.com/webstores/dollfie/index.php?dispatch=products.view&product_id=4057

Includes:

  • Doll (Dollfie Dream® Base Body III, Semi-White Skin, SS Bust with “Hatsune Miku” Original Head and Dollfie® Animetic Eyes “Hatsune Miku” Original Design, Metallic, 22 mm) 
  • Wig (“Hatsune Miku” Original Style, DD Size)
  • Hair Accessories (×2)
  • Headset
  • Necktie
  • Necktie Pin
  • Blouse
  • Arm Covers
  • Decoration Parts for Arm Covers (×2)
  • Skirt with Belt
  • Panties
  • Boots
  • Normal Left Hand (DDII-H-01-SW)
  • Paper
  • Outspread Right Hand (DDII-H-04-SW)
  • Special Decal
  • DD Skin Protect Tape (Semi-White)
Dollfie Dream Sister Kagamine Rin

Price: $648.00 USD

Purchase Page: http://volksusastore.com/webstores/dollfie/index.php?dispatch=products.view&product_id=8192

Includes:

  • Doll (Dollfie Dream® Sister Base Body/Normal Skin/SS Bust with “Kagamine Rin” Original Head and Dollfie® Animetic Eyes “Kagamine Rin/Kagamine Len” Original Design, Metallic, 24 mm)
  • Wig (“Kagamine Rin” Original Style, DD Size)
  • Hair Bow
  • Hair Accessory (×4)
  • Headset
  • Bow Tie
  • Sailor Collar
  • Top
  • Arm Covers
  • Arm Cover Parts (×2)
  • Belt/Shorts with Belt
  • Panties
  • Foot Covers
  • Shoes
  • Microphone
  • Decal Sticker
Dollfie Dream Sister Kagamine Len

Price: $694.00 USD

Purchase Page: http://volksusastore.com/webstores/dollfie/index.php?dispatch=products.view&product_id=8193

Includes:

  • Doll (Dollfie Dream® Sister Base Body/Normal Skin/Boy Type with “Kagamine Len” Original Head and Dollfie® Animetic Eyes “Kagamine Rin/Kagamine Len” Original Design, Metallic, 22 mm)
  • Wig (“Kagamine Len” Original Style, DD Size)
  • Headset
  • Tie
  • Sailor Collar
  • Top
  • Arm Covers
  • Arm Cover Parts (×2)
  • Shorts with Belt
  • Underwear
  • Foot Covers
  • Shoes
  • Shoulder Keyboard
  • Shoulder Strap
  • Decal Sticker
  • Dollfie Dream® Sister “Kagamine Len” comes with a pair of Gripping Hands (Large Ver.) (DDII-H-06B). His hands are special editions with painted nails.

Outfits

Of course, no Dollfie is complete without multiple outfits to dress them in! Unfortunately, there’s still no word on the “Servant & Daughter of Evil” outfits announced earlier this year. However, you can still grab “Senbonzakura” outfits for both Kagamines as well as Miku! The “SIREN” outfit set from “This is the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee” will also be available.

Miku Outfits

Senbonzakura Outfit Set (Ichi no Sakura: Cherry Blossom)

Price: $198.00 USD

Purchase Page: http://volksusastore.com/webstores/dollfie/index.php?dispatch=products.view&product_id=4058

Includes:

  • Hat
  • Kimono
  • Sarashi (Inner Bust Wrap)
  • Gloves
  • Cuffs
  • Skirt with Suspender Belt
  • Thigh-high Socks
  • Boots
  • Wig
  • Special Animetic Eyes
SIREN Outfit Set

Price: $130.00 USD

Purchase Page: http://volksusastore.com/webstores/dollfie/index.php?dispatch=products.view&product_id=5453

Includes:

  • Headdress
  • Choker
  • Dress
  • Gloves (for Normal Hands)
  • Gloves (for Holding Hands)
  • Under Skirt
  • Petticoat
  • Shoes

Kagamine Rin & Len Outfits

Senbonzakura Outfit Set (Ni no Sakura: Butterfly)

Price: $180.00 USD

Purchase Page: http://volksusastore.com/webstores/dollfie/index.php?dispatch=products.view&product_id=8194

Includes: 

  • Bonnet
  • Eye Patch
  • Kimono Jacket
  • Tie
  • Skirt
  • Socks
  • Geta (Clogs)
  • Wig
  • Special Animetic Eyes
Senbonzakura Outfit Set (Ni no Sakura: Fan Dance)

Price: $180.00 USD

Purchase Page: http://volksusastore.com/webstores/dollfie/index.php?dispatch=products.view&product_id=8195

Includes:

  • Hat
  • Overcoat
  • Kimono Jacket
  • Gloves
  • Shorts
  • Socks
  • Boots
  • Wig
  • Special Animetic Eyes

More Information

For more information, be sure to follow the VOLKS USA Facebook page as well as the ANIME MATSURI 2017 celebration page.

Sales begin at 9 AM Pacific Time on April 7th, so be sure to go here and grab your Dollfies before they run out!

In addition, there are currently a few other items on the ANIME MATSURI 2017 celebration page. These items are available for order now. Most aren’t directly related to the characters, but the $39.00 USD cooking set certainly is very fitting for Miku! They’re limited to one per customer, though.

The post VOLKS USA Hosting Limited Web Event for VOCALOID Dollfie Dream Dolls! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Kagamine Rin & Len Dollfie Dream “Daughter of Evil” and “Servant of Evil” Outfits Announced!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
The Snow Miku festival is in full swing, but Kagamine fans will be happy to hear the blond duo is in the spotlight as well. The Kagamine Rin and Len Dollfie Dream Sister dolls are receiving some iconic outfits! Rin is receiving a “Daughter of Evil” dress while Len will have a lovely “Servant of …

The post Kagamine Rin & Len Dollfie Dream “Daughter of Evil” and “Servant of Evil” Outfits Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The Snow Miku festival is in full swing, but Kagamine fans will be happy to hear the blond duo is in the spotlight as well. The Kagamine Rin and Len Dollfie Dream Sister dolls are receiving some iconic outfits! Rin is receiving a “Daughter of Evil” dress while Len will have a lovely “Servant of Evil” suit.

Kagamine Rin’s Dress

While there are many renditions of Rin’s “Daughter of Evil” outfit, this dress seems to be based on the one Rin wears in the manga adaptation of the song series.

She looks incredibly elegant, just like one would imagine. It’s hard to believe she’s actually so evil!

The dress itself has three colors: A shiny yellow that appears to have a bit of a floral pattern on it, a peachy color, and white. Unlike most “Daughter of Evil” dresses we see, this one lacks any black. The only black you’ll see in the outfit are Rin’s barrettes and a small black accent on her bow.

It’s definitely quite the change of pace and really makes the whole outfit seem different. The black always added that bit of menace to Rin’s design, but now she looks incredibly innocent.

It’s definitely a must-have for “Daughter of Evil” and Rin fans!

 

Kagamine Len’s Suit

Len’s outfit matches Rin’s very well but also keeps him looking rather spiffy. Like Rin, he has floral patterns on parts of his outfit. However, he also goes for slightly darker tones that are a bit less feminine.

Instead of the peachy color that Rin has, Len’s outfit comprises of a brown vest that matches his shoes.

However, once again, the designers opted not to go for the black accents, leaving him looking far brighter than some renditions. It’s a very interesting outfit but really fits the times of princes and princesses!

More Information

At the moment, not much is known about these two outfits. We’re not sure of their prices or release dates, but we’ll be sure to keep fans posted. So stay tuned to VNN for any new information that may surface!

In addition, you can read more about the Rin and Len Dollfie Dream Sister Dolls in the following articles.

Rin And Len Dollfie Dreams Revealed
Overseas Order Information for Rin and Len Dollfie Dreams Revealed!

Source: Twitter

The post Kagamine Rin & Len Dollfie Dream “Daughter of Evil” and “Servant of Evil” Outfits Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Summer Wonder Festival 2016 Highlights
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Every Wonder Festival is bound to please and this summer’s was no different. Summer WonFes 2016 not only provided us with some awesome new Miku figures to look forward to, but also covered the VOCALOID spectrum all the way to China! There was quite a bit of Miku but Luka, Rin, and Len took the …

The post Summer Wonder Festival 2016 Highlights appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Every Wonder Festival is bound to please and this summer’s was no different. Summer WonFes 2016 not only provided us with some awesome new Miku figures to look forward to, but also covered the VOCALOID spectrum all the way to China! There was quite a bit of Miku but Luka, Rin, and Len took the stage on top of that. In addition, IA and ONE made an appearance as well as Stardust. It was a super busy WonFes!

Hatsune Miku Figures

As always, there’s lots of Miku figures! For image sources, click the names in the bulleted list. All of our Miku figure information is from MikuFan. They uploaded a nice gallery of all the Miku figures on Facebook.

Magical Mirai 2016 Miku Nendoroid – No price or release date announced.
Snow Miku 1/8 Scale – No price or release date announced.
Hatsune Miku: Heart Hunter Ver. 1/7 Scale – No price or release date announced.
Racing Miku 2016 1/8 Scale – Price Unannounced. Will be available this autumn.
Hatsune Miku: Rage of Bahamut (unknown scale size) – No price or release date announced.
Racing Miku 2016 Prize Figure – Set for October 2016 release.
2D Dream Fever Miku 1/8 Scale – No price or release date announced.
Thailand Racing Miku 2015 1/8th Scale – No price or release date announced.
Hatsune Miku: Project Diva X Ver. Prize Figure – Set for December 2016 release.

Previously Announced Figures

Some figures were announced a while ago but appeared at WonFes so that they could be shown off in all their glory. In addition, we finally got prototypes of several highly anticipated figures!

1/12 Scale Kagamine Rin and Len Swimsuit Versions

Last WonFes, we saw a teaser silhouette of these two in what appeared to be swimsuits. It’s been confirmed that they are part of the 1/12 scale ‘SMALL & STYLISH’, or S-style for short, line. There’s no release date known at the moment. However, Kagamine fans can look forward to affordable figures of these two! The S-style figures retail for around $30 USD, give or take a few dollars.

Image Source: Twitter @phaius66

MEIKO Figma

MEIKO fans have only been waiting a year for this prototype! She was announced during Summer WonFes 2015 and has finally come to life! While the prototype isn’t painted yet, there’s still progress!

Image Source: Twitter @phaius66

KAITO and MEIKO Hanairogoromo Ver.

We saw teasers of these two just a few days ago, and now their faces have finally been revealed! These two are set to release in May 2017 with pre-orders opening July 29th and remaining open until some time in September or until the pre-order limit is reached.

Image Source: Twitter @odatsuyoshi

1/8 Scale Stardust

The much-anticipated 1/8 scale Stardust figure finally has a painted prototype. We covered the original prototype reveal in May and now we’re happy to show the update to the project! There’s no known release date for this figure at the moment. However, we’ll be sure to keep fans updated.

Image Source: Weibo User VC相关推广站
Image Source: aminews Twitter

1/4 Scale Megurine Luka V4X

Luka fans, rejoice! There’s finally a prototype for the 1/4 scale Luka V4X figure. This unpainted version was even displayed next to the 1/4 scale Miku V3 figure. There’s no set release date for this figure at the moment but Luka fans should start saving. The 1/4 scales are rather pricey.

Image source: Twitter @phaius66

1/8 Scale IA ROCKS and ONE

These two figures have been teased for quite a while now. They were finally given a release date though! They’ll be available in 2017. At the moment, the prices are to be determined.

Image Sources: Twitter @haruto153 (IA) (ONE)

Kagamine Rin and Len Dollfie Dream

We’ve covered the Kagamine Dollfies before but they made an appearance at WonFes. It’s interesting to see the two when not photographed specifically for product photos. A lot of information has been released about these two as well. You can see Rin’s product page in English here and Len’s here.

The two dolls are set to ship in October. Fans interested in purchasing them can check out our article here for more information on them as well as how to get them if you don’t live in Japan.

Rin will cost 70,000 yen (plus a fee) while Len will cost 75,000 yen (plus a fee) for overseas buyers.

In addition, the body suits for those who don’t want to put the “02” decals on their Dollfies will cost another 3,000 yen plus a fee.

At the moment, there’s no word on how much these fees will be.

New Figure Announcements

There weren’t many new figures outside of the realm of Miku. However, there’s another figure for Luka fans and even a Nendoroid Co-De for Len lovers.

The 1/7 scale Megurine Luka Temptation ver. along with the Nendoroid Co-De Kagamine Len Trickster (Tricker) ver. were on the wall of upcoming projects. While there aren’t any prototypes for them yet, fans of these two VOCALOIDs can look forward to the planned releases.

Image Sources: Summer WonFes 2016 Online Gallery (Luka) and Twitter @me_yamaneko (Len)

Prize Figures

Sega has quite the prize figure lineup this time around! Here’s the list with pictures shown below it. Click the names of the figures to go to the image source.

  • Megurine Luka Amour Ver. – Release Date: September.
  • Hatsune Miku Innocent Ver. – Release Date: August.
  • KAITO Guilty Ver. – Release Date: July.
  • Hatsune Miku Christmas Outfit – Release Date: October.
  • Kagamine Rin Christmas Outfit – Release Date: November.

The post Summer Wonder Festival 2016 Highlights appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Overseas Order Information for Rin and Len Dollfie Dreams Revealed!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
The Kagamine Rin and Len Dollfie Dreams brought the fans excitement from the moment they were announced. Now there’s information on the two in English as well as information on how to get them if you don’t live in Japan. Price Changes Kagamine fans not in Japan will have to pay a bit more for …

The post Overseas Order Information for Rin and Len Dollfie Dreams Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The Kagamine Rin and Len Dollfie Dreams brought the fans excitement from the moment they were announced. Now there’s information on the two in English as well as information on how to get them if you don’t live in Japan.

Price Changes

Kagamine fans not in Japan will have to pay a bit more for these two dolls. Rin will cost 70,000 yen (plus a fee) while Len will cost 75,000 yen (plus a fee) for overseas buyers. At the moment, there’s no word on how much these fees will be.

Body Suit Cost

In addition, the body suits for those who don’t want to put the “02” decals on their Dollfies will cost another 3,000 yen plus a fee.

Information in English

All pages with information on the Kagamines are now available in English. You can find information on Rin’s Dollfie here and Len’s here. There’s also information available on the Kagamine Rin Dollfie Dream Sister Full Body Suit as well as the DDS Boy Type body.

Obtaining the Dolls

For now, the only way for overseas fans to obtain these dolls is via lottery. Fans interested can sign up here between August 13th at 11:00 JST and September 12th at 10:00 JST. Winners will be emailed on September 28th and the payment deadline is October 3rd at 10:00 JST. The dolls are set to ship in late October.

More Info

As always, we’ll be sure to update fans if any more purchase options come out for international fans. Be sure to stay tuned for more updates!

The post Overseas Order Information for Rin and Len Dollfie Dreams Revealed! appeared first on VNN.
